name: v2retailTemplate
description: V2 Front End for Retail Template

scripts.serve: npm run shiftstyles && npm run shiftwallet && npm run shifttrade && npm run build && live-server build
scripts.library: cd ../APEXLibrary && npm i && npm run build && cp -R build/. ../v2retailTemplate/js && cd ../v2retailTemplate
scripts.library-dev: cd ../APEXLibrary && npm i && npm run build-dev && cp -R build/. ../v2retailTemplate/js && cd ../v2retailTemplate
scripts.widgets: cd ../APEXWidgets && npm run build && cp -R build/. ../v2retailTemplate/js && cd ../v2retailTemplate
scripts.widgetsWithI: cd ../APEXWidgets && npm i && npm run build-dev && cp -R build/. ../v2retailTemplate/js && cd ../v2retailTemplate
scripts.dev: parallelshell "npm run dev:sass" "npm run dev:server" "npm run widgets"
scripts.dev-watch: parallelshell "npm run dev:sass" "npm run dev:server" "npm run widgets-dev"
scripts.start: npm run watch-shiftstyles | npm run watch-shiftwallet | npm run watch-shifttrade

author: ShiftMarkets
